name: Dissimortuum
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dissimortuum makes three Claw attacks. It can replace one Claw attack with a use of Terrifying Mask.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d8 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Terrifying Mask
actions.desc: Each non-Undead creature within 60 feet of the dissimortuum that can see it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target becomes immune to the dissimortuum's Terrifying Mask for the next 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The dissimortuum can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: The dissimortuum doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
